text: The Best & the Rest is a greatest hits compilation by Polish singer Kayah, released in 2005. ==Background== The album is the first retrospective of Kayah's career. It collects her biggest hits on disc 1, plus a new song "Jutro rano" and re-recordings of "Na językach" and her debut 1988 single "Córeczko". Disc 2 consists mainly of songs recorded for various projects, previously not available on any Kayah album, and remixes. The Best & the Rest was her final album released under Sony BMG label. "Jutro rano" was released as the single and became a radio hit in Poland. ==Track listing== Adapted from the album's sleeve. CD 1: The Best #"Jutro rano" (feat. Smolik) - 3:10 #"Prócz ciebie, nic" (feat. Krzysztof Kiljański) - 3:36 #"Do D.N.A." - 4:32 #"Testosteron" - 3:07 #"Embarcacao" (feat.
